content: I'm thinking of optimizing the lighting in my living room further. I've already replaced the old floor lamp with a new one with an adjustable arm, which has made a big difference. I'm wondering if you have any suggestions for other ways to improve the lighting in the room. Oh, and by the way, I've been on a bit of a lighting kick lately - I also recently installed new shelf lighting in my closet as part of a major cleaning and organization project about a month ago.
